title: A SIMPLE WAY TO CREATE AN OUTDOOR STORAGE SPACE

tasks.task: Install storage solution for tractor tools to prevent weed growth and improve accessibility.
subtasks: Measure the required linear footage for storing tractor attachments.
Determine the width of the storage area needed.
Purchase sufficient quantities of fabric and geotextile material.
Calculate the total cost of materials.
Assess the effectiveness of the storage solution in deterring weeds and drainage.
Evaluate the overall improvement of the storage setup compared to previous methods.

tasks.task: Evaluate the methods of storage for tractor attachments, considering alternative approaches.
subtasks: Consider other possible solutions besides the one implemented.
